description: A candidate qualifies only if written score is at least 60 interview score at least 15 and total does not exceed 100. Python code: written_score = int(input("Enter written score: ")) interview_score = int(input("Enter interview score: ")) total_score = written_score + interview_score if written_score >= 60 and interview_score >= 15 and total_score <= 100: print("Candidate qualifies") else: print("Candidate does not qualify")
